1.verse: UYuda, umkhonzi kaYesu Kristu, umzalwana ke kaYakobi,  ubhalela abangcwalisiweyo bekuThixo uYise, begcinelwe uYesu Kristu, bengababiziweyo:

2.verse: uthi, Makwandiswe kuni inceba noxolo nothando.

3.verse: Zintanda, ndikukhuthalele ngenyameko yonke nje ukunibhalela ngalo usindiso esidlelana ngalo, kwafuneka ukuba ndinibhalele,  ndinivuselele, ukuba niluzamele ukholo abalunikelwayo kwakanye abangcwele.

4.verse: Kuba kuthwethwe bantu bathile; abo babebalulelwe ngenxa engaphambili kolo lugwebo, abangahloneli Thixo, belujikela eburheletyweni ubabalo lukaThixo wethu, bemkhanyela okuphela koMnini-nto-zonke, uThixo wethu, iNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

5.verse: Ndinga ke ndinganikhumbuza, nangona nikwazi oku kakade,  ukuba iNkosi, yakuba ibasindisile abantu emhlabeni waseYiputa,  yathi ngokwesibini yabatshabalalisa abo bangakholwanga.

6.verse: Kananjalo izithunywa zezulu, ezo zazingalugcinanga ulawulo lwazo, zesuka zalishiya ikhaya lazo, izigcinele umgwebo womhla omkhulu ngemixokelelwane engunaphakade, phantsi kwesithokothoko.

7.verse: Njengokuba iSodom neGomora, nayo imizi engakuyo, yenza kakhulu umbulo ngohlobo olufana nolwazo ezo, imka ilandela nyama yimbi, ibekwe ekuhleni ukuba ibe ngumqondiso, iviswa ubetho lomlilo ongunaphakade.

8.verse: Kwangokunjalo nabo aba baphuphayo badyobha inyama,  batshitshise ubukhosi, banyelise izikhakhamela.

9.verse: Kanti yena uMikayeli, isiphatha-zithunywa zezulu, oko wayebambene naye uMtyholi, bebangisana ngawo umzimba kaMoses,  akabanga nabuganga bakumzisela mgwebo wakunyelisa; wesuka wathi, INkosi mayikukhalimele.

10.verse: Ke bona aba okunene izinto zonke abangazaziyo bayazinyelisa; kodwa izinto zonke abazaziyo kakuhle ngemvelo,  njengezinto eziphilileyo ezingenangqondo, bayazonakalisa ngazo ezo.

11.verse: Yeha ke bona! Ngokuba bahamba ngendlela kaKayin;  bakhukuliswa lulahlekiso lukaBhileham ngenxa yomvuzo;  batshabalala ephikeni likaKora.

12.verse: Aba zizixhobo zamatye aselwandle ezidlweni zenu zothando,  bezingxala ukudla nani, bezidlisa okwabo ngokungenakoyika.  Bangamafu angenamanzi, aqhutywaqhutywa yimimoya; bayimithi evuthulukileyo, engenaziqhamo, efe kabini, enyothulwe iingcambu;

13.verse: bangamaza alwayo olwandle, elephuza awawo amahlazo;  baziinkwenkwezi eziphalaphalayo, begcinelwe isithokothoko sobumnyama ngonaphakade.

14.verse: Waprofeta ke nangabo uEnoki, owesixhenxe ukususela kuAdam,  esithi, Yabonani, yeza iNkosi namawakawaka abangcwele bayo,

15.verse: ukuba ibagwebe bonke, ibohlwaye bonke abangahloneli Thixo kubo, ngenxa yemisebenzi yabo yonke yokungahloneli Thixo,  abayenze bengahloneli Thixo, nangenxa yazo zonke izinto ezilukhuni, ababezithethile ngayo aboni abangahloneli Thixo.

16.verse: Aba ngabakrokri abasolayo, behamba ngokweenkanuko zabo,  umlomo wabo uthetha iindumbisa zamazwi, bencoma ubuso bomntu ngenxa yenzuzo.

17.verse: Ke nina, zintanda, wakhumbuleni amazwi abethethwe ngenxa engaphambili ngabo abapostile beNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

18.verse: Ngokuba babesithi kuni, Kuya kubakho abagxeki ngexesha lokugqibela, behamba ngokwezabo iinkanuko zokungahloneli Thixo.

20.verse: Ke nina, zintanda, zakheni elukholweni lwenu olungcwele kanye, nithandaza nikuMoya oyiNgcwele.

21.verse: Hlalani nihleli eluthandweni lukaThixo, niyilinde inceba yeNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu, kuse ebomini obungunaphakade.

23.verse: kodwa inxenye yisindiseni nizoyikela, nibaphanga emlilweni,  niyithiya nengubo edyojiweyo yinyama.

24.verse: Kulowo ke unako ukunilondoloza ningabi nakukhubeka,  nokunimisa phambi kobuqaqawuli bakhe ningenabala, nigcoba:

25.verse: kuThixo olumkileyo yedwa, uMsindisi wethu, makubekho uzuko nobukhulu, amandla negunya, nangoku, kude kuse nasemaphakadeni onke. Amen.
